Class NetworkUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidmiguel.gobees.data.source.network.NetworkUtils

  • class NetworkUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    These utilities will be used to communicate with the weather servers.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentWeatherUrl

        static java.net.URL getCurrentWeatherUrl(double latitude,
                                         double longitude)
        Builds the URL to get current weather data.
        Parameters:
        latitude - the latitude of the location.
        longitude - the longitude of the location.
        Returns:
        url to use to query the weather server.

      • getResponseFromHttpUrl

        static java.lang.String getResponseFromHttpUrl(java.net.URL url)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        This method returns the entire result from the HTTP response.
        Parameters:
        url - URL to fetch the HTTP response from.
        Returns:
        contents of the HTTP response, null if no response.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - related to network and stream reading.
